sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function Eco() { return ( <>
ECO-SYSTEM
Cinemaverse

Cinemaverse is the world's most extensive and most immersive interactive entertainment metaverse. We aim to create a digital revolution in the media industry. Numerous production houses have tied up with Cinemaverse for their upcoming releases. The Metaverse is the future of the movie industry, where the user will experience something beyond the screen. The Cinemaverse is the latest innovation done by the CinemaKoin team to enhance the experience of the media industry taking decades ahead. Users now have access to everything they want to watch on their fingertips.

Cinemachain

CinemaKoin will be a decentralized, open-source blockchain with smart contract functionality. CinemaKoin will be the native cryptocurrency of the Cinemachain platform. The CinemaChain Virtual Machine will be the software platform that developers can use to create decentralized applications (DApps) on CinemaChain. This virtual machine is where all CinemaChain accounts and smart contracts live.

CINE - NFTPLACE

We are aware that NFT provides exclusive ownership rights. It is almost like copyright in real life. The joy of owning and preserving something valuable is unfathomable. With the buzz that our cinema artists, actors, directors, and producers create, owning their works, autographs, and pictures in NFTs is absolute gold.

C-Swap EXCHANGE

C-Swap will be a decentralized exchange (DEX), that is a peer-to-peer (P2P) trading platform where crypto assets will be transacted directly between buyers and sellers. C-Swap will rely on self-executing smart contracts that keep track of every transaction and log it to the blockchain. The vision behind C-swap is to have permission-less access to trading, end-to-end on-chain infrastructure with no central points of failure and decentralized ownership across a community of distributed stakeholders. C-Swap will offer strong execution guarantee and increased transparency into the underlying mechanics of trading.

) }
